cef6158841d09acabcff77a150c80a7d9ff9eca1: query GetCartById($id: ID!) { cart(id: $id) { id items { id name quantity unitTotal { formatted } } totalItems totalUniqueItems } }
b8acb020a7364c18ba3c3ff2da9c427cb886f6af: mutation AddItemToCart($cartId: ID!, $id: ID!, $name: String!, $price: Int!) { addItem(input: {cartId: $cartId, id: $id, name: $name, price: $price}) { id subTotal { amount formatted } } }
